name: MANIC MINERS
description: Welcome to "MANIC MINERS" - just imagine, "Lemmings" meets "Boulderdash" ... with TNTs, fuse bombs, lasers and flamers tossed-in-too! Deploy your Tiny Miners (TM) to collect, and safely return home, as many jewels as possible. But, be very, very, aware - there's a million ways to die daan there!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Graphics: Vertex / Pixel Shaders: 4.0 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 512 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Graphics: Vertex / Pixel Shaders: 4.0 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 512 MB available space
